are disseminated and discussed with
concerned stakeholders.

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Ph. 2, Bahay Katuparan, Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite (046) 235 – 7997 www.cvsu.edu.ph
DISSEMINATION OF RESULT OF MONITORING AND EVALUATION DURING BRGY. BAGTAS GENERAL ASSEMBLY AND CONSULTATIVE MEETING
Cavite State University – Tanza Campus held its first general assembly and consultative meeting on
October 13, 2018. The assembly and consultative meeting was held from 8:00 a.m. until 1:00 pm at the covered
court of Lumina Subdivision where hundreds of Bagtas residents, officials, faculty members and students
participated.
During the meeting, results of monitoring and evaluation from the past extension activities were presented
to the participants. These were presented by the following:
Results of Monitoring and Evaluation of Livelihood Training Programs Extension Coordinator: Mr. Ritch M. Banate
Results of Monitoring and Evaluation of Oplan Karunungan Department Chairperson: Ms. Mildred A. Sebastian
Results of Monitoring and Evaluation of Computer Literacy Program Department Chairperson: Ms. Joyce Erika S. Senaris
Results of Monitoring and Evaluation of Health and Wellness Program Coordinator: Mr. Cris Albert P. Cajigas
The results were thoroughly discussed to the concerned stakeholders so that they will be able to make
suggestion/s that will help to improve the extension programs of the campus. Suggestions from the concerned
stakeholders will be used as basis for more extension activities and for ideal operation that will certainly improve
the lives of the community.
Prepared by: Reviewed by:
RITCH M. BANATE PROF. NOEL A. SEDIGO Extension Coordinator Campus Administrator
